EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to BlueWave!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Welcome to BlueWave — our clean energy future starts with you!
BlueWave has partnered with Distributed Solar Development, LLC to manage your community solar subscription and deliver you savings on your electric bill.
In anticipation of your first solar credits in the coming months, we invite you to get acquainted with your community solar portal where you can:
• Chat with a member of the BlueWave Customer Care team • Submit questions about your subscription • View your monthly community solar statement and make payments • Access our customer FAQ and other helpful resources
To access your portal, click the link below and login using the username, <contactemail@email.com>. If this is your first time logging in, please follow the directions on the portal log in page to create a new password.
Log Into Your Portal Here
Have questions? Check out our FAQs or log into your portal to chat with a member of our Customer Care team. You can also reach us at 844.786.4100 or customercare@bluewavesolar.com. We're happy to help. Thanks for joining the wave, we're happy you're here.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
